item.title: Yuta Shintomi
item.description: 所属 TBA 経歴 会津大学大学院 コンピュータ理工学研究科 プロジェクトマネジメント専攻 修士(コンピュータ理工学) (2022.04 - 2024.03) 会津大学 コンピュータ理工学部 コンピュータ理工学科 学士(コンピュータ理工学) 早期卒業 (2019.04 - 2022.03) 出版物 Y. Shintomi, Y. Shimmyo, Y. Okuyama, and S. Nishimura, “Evaluation of 3D Point-Cloud Reconstruction Using Overlapped Frames in Fragment Construction,” Frontiers in Artificial Intelligence and Applications. IOS Press, Sep. 14, 2022. doi: 10.3233/faia220273. T. Kohsuke, S. Yuta, O. Yuichi and S. Taro, “Design of Reward Functions for RL-based High-Speed Autonomous Driving,” 2022 IEEE 15th International Symposium on Embedded Multicore/Many-core Systems-on-Chip (MCSoC), Penang, Malaysia, 2022, pp.

item.title: Hello!
item.description: Yuta Shintomi Belongs University of Aizu Graduate School Computer Science and Engineering Department of Project Management Master’s Course 1st year Education B.S. Computer Science and Engineering, the University of Aizu, skip a grade (Apr. 2019 - Mar. 2022) Sendai First High School (Apr. 2016 - Mar. 2019) Research Topics 3D Reconstruction Sim2real Works
